item.title: WFC
item.description: score:-8 Chances: Wells Fargo cleared to underwrite Texas muni-bond deals by AG. Cost control aids Wells Fargo amid lower revenues. Wells Fargo defeats class action suit over fake interviews. Wells Fargo offers down-payment grants to boost minority homeownership. Wells Fargo announces full redemption of its Series Q Preferred Stock.
